description: Social Services for Social Development and Cohesion

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description:
The project aims to improve municipal responsiveness to social inequalities and deficiencies of social services for vulnerable groups, contributing to decrease in  social differences. This is being achieved by delivering the following outputs:
• Designing a new model of inter-governmental transfers by developing a new equalization formula and capacity building for main stakeholders for management of the new system
• Establishment of a sustainable system  for data collection and analysis 
• Introduction of participatory planning service delivery practices in municipalities, by establishment of community based planning groups, training municipal authorities and civil society  on  social service policy, local budgeting and monitoring for local officials and representatives of vulnerable groups, as well as engaging civil society in monitoring the outcomes of the process.
subproject.title: Fiscal Equalization
